Text: RE ISDA AGM Cc be great Your assistant should contact mine Sue Edwards All the best Mark Original Message From mailto Sent March To Mark liffordChancecom Cc Subject Re ISDA AGM Mark I would like to get together at the AGM I will ask my assistant to work on a time would could meet and propose that to you Hope things are going well Mark Haedicke Mark lifford Chancecom To cc PM Subject ISDA AGM Mark Remembering that we missed each other in London will you be at the AGM in DC If so shall we get together briefly I met Mark Evans from your team in London recently and had a useful chat about the state of the relationship between CC and Enron I also know that David Yeres from our NY office met with you some time back in Houston He will also be at the AGM and would I know like to follow up on that meeting Best regards Mark This message and any attachment are confidential and may be privileged or otherwise protected from disclosure If you are not the intended recipient please telephone or email the sender and delete this message and any attachment from your system If you are not the intended recipient you must not copy this message or attachment or disclose the contents to any other person For further information about Clifford Chance please see our website at or refer to any Clifford Chance office
